TextView.android:text: At Beleza By The Beach, you can spend time at the beach relaxing in a sun lounger, plus you'll be 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Colva Beach. The outdoor pool provides a splash of fun, while guests in the mood for pampering can visit the spa to indulge in massages, body wraps, and mani/pedis. Dining choices include 2 restaurants and the bar/lounge is a great place to grab a cold drink. Other highlights at this upscale resort include a poolside bar, a health club, and a fitness center.
